pages.text: The $(item)Hellfire Forge$() is one of the core crafting mechanics of $(6)Blood Magic$(), alongside the $(l:altar/bloodaltar)Blood Altar$(/l) itself. Here, you can work with the $(l:demon_will/demon_will)$(item)Demon Will$() you have harvested from mobs, to allow you to create $(l:demon_will/sentienttools)$(item)Sentient Tools$(), including the $(l:demon_will/sentientsword)$(item)Sentient Sword$(), $(l:demon_will/soulgem)$(item)Tartaric Gems$(), various $(item)reagents$(), $(l:alchemy_array/arcaneash)Arcane Ash$(), and many things besides.
